Metadata.title: Albert Ezoula | Software Engineer
Metadata.description: Welcome to my developer portfolio! Explore a collection of my projects and web applications showcasing my expertise in building dynamic and interactive user interfaces. With a passion for clean code and innovative solutions, I strive to create seamless user experiences that blend functionality with stunning designs.

About.title: About me
About.paragraph1: After graduating with a degree in Law, I decided to pursue my passion for programming. I enrolled in a coding bootcamp and learned full-stack web development. My favorite part of programming is the problem-solving aspect. I love the feeling of finally figuring out a solution to a problem. My core stack is React, Next.js, Node.js, and MongoDB. I am also familiar with TypeScript and Prisma. I am always looking to learn new technologies. I am currently looking for a full-time position as a software developer.
About.paragraph2: When I'm not coding, I enjoy playing video games, watching movies, and playing with my dog. I also enjoy learning new things. I am currently learning about history and philosophy. I'm also learning how to play the guitar.

project1.title: Hirrd | Job Board
project1.description: Hirrd is a modern job portal app that streamlines job searching and recruitment.

project2.title: Yoom | Meeting App
project2.description: Yoom is an innovative meeting application that facilitates virtual collaboration through high-quality video and audio interactions.

project3.title: Summariser | AI App
project3.description: Summariser is an AI-powered application that condenses lengthy texts into concise summaries, enhancing reading efficiency and comprehension.

project4.title: Foodie | Online Food Delivery
project4.description: Foodie is a food delivery app that connects users with local restaurants for quick and convenient online ordering.

project5.title: notes | Note Taking App
project5.description: notes is a simple note-taking application that allows users to create, edit, and delete notes.

project6.title: React_Secure
project6.description: React_Secure is a password management application that securely stores and encrypts user login information.

exp1.title: Web Developement Course
exp1.description: Developed and maintained web applications using MERN. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features. Conducted code reviews and provided technical support to team members.

exp2.title: Software Engineering
exp2.description: Completed a rigorous software engineering program focused on full-stack development. Participated in hands-on projects and coding challenges to enhance problem-solving skills. Gained experience with industry-standard tools and technologies.

exp3.title: Buiding Web Applications
exp3.description: Designed and developed web applications from concept to deployment. Utilized agile methodologies to deliver high-quality software products on time and within budget. Conducted user testing and gathered feedback to improve application usability.
